tool_description: The IEEE Spectrum News API is a simple HTTP-based API that allows developers and students to access the latest news and articles from the IEEE Spectrum website as well as integrate them as data into their own websites web applications or mobile apps. The API uses "REST-Like" operations over HTTP GET requests with parameters Header encoded into the request and its response encoded in JSON format.This API has been created for bringing the latest technology news provided by the  IEEE Spectrum Ne...
name: IEEE Spectrum API
title: IEEE Spectrum API

api_list.name: Get the latest 30 News from IEEE Spectrum
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the latest 30 news from IEEE Spectrum website as JSON objects with 6 data elements. These will be the Title, URL, DatePublished, Section, Image source and how much time it takes to read the article.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ieee-spectrum-api.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ieee-spectrum-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ieee-spectrum-api.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ieee-spectrum-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
